meanings.definition: The right-hand page of an open book.
meanings.sent1: I always find beautiful illustrations on the recto of my favorite storybooks.
meanings.sent2: She eagerly turned the page to reveal the colorful recto of the book.
meanings.sent3: The recto of the book winked at me with its vibrant pictures.
meanings.sent4: The recto of the book was like a window into a magical world.
meanings.sent5: The recto of the book sparkled with enchanting images.

meanings.definition: The front side of a sheet of paper.
meanings.sent1: Please write your name on the recto of the paper.
meanings.sent2: The important information is printed on the recto of the document.
meanings.sent3: The recto of the paper smiled at me with its neat handwriting.
meanings.sent4: The recto of the paper held the key to solving the puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The recto of the paper whispered secrets in elegant script.
